meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Special Recognition
agenda_items.description: Celebrating Michael Haynes on his retirement after 31 years of service and dedication to the City of Dallas and the Park & Recreation Department

agenda_items.title: Kiest Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize a professional services contract with AEC Holdco, LLC DBA Grace Herbert Curtis Architects, LLC for architectural and engineering services for the renovation of three recreation center facilities.

agenda_items.title: Halperin Park
agenda_items.description: Authorize the naming of the H-E-B Main Stage Fountain at Halperin Park.

agenda_items.title: Aquatic Fees
agenda_items.description: Authorize an increase to the specified aquatic fees at all City of Dallas aquatics facilities.

agenda_items.title: Other/Non-Action Items
agenda_items.description: Park and Recreation Board Members liaison reports and Staff Announcements.

agenda_items.title: Next Meeting
agenda_items.description: Next Park Board Meeting will be on Thursday, April 17, 2025, at 10:00 a.m.

financial_items.description: Professional services contract for architectural and engineering services for the renovation of three recreation center facilities.
Estimated revenue from increased aquatic fees at all City of Dallas aquatics facilities.
